original_text: At these two corners they must be double from the bottom all the way to the top and fitted into a single ring; both shall be like that.
korean_text: 아래에서부터 위까지 각기 두 겹 두께로 하여 윗고리에 이르게 하고 두 모퉁이 쪽을 다 그리하며

sentences.original_text: At these two corners they must be double
from the bottom all the way to the top
and fitted into a single ring
